original_title: ¡Viva Edy! La Historia de una Musica Indestructible
overview: Edy Martinez, the story of the evolution of Latin jazz and Salsa during the 50s in New York, seen through a Colombian musician, who today can walk among the crowds, whose don´t recognizing his immense legacy.
title: Viva Edy! The Story of an Indestructible Music
